infoMsg1: Hey there! If you're seeing this, it means you want to add the bot to your server. Before we do that, there are a couple things you need to know about the bot. If you do not follow these steps, the bot won't work for you, and will error for me! We don't want that, do we?
First, you must create a couple roles, these being Staff and Administrator, and these roles are CaSe SeNsItIvE. That enables the permissions system to work.
Next, you need to make a channel named 'logs'. This is where all of the logs for bans, kicks, warnings and mutes go.
infoMsg2: Then, you need to invite the bot! Here's an invite link. https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?permissions=2146958591&scope=bot&client_id=329022281013657612

Once you've done that, do `/help` to see all the commands that the bot has for you. This invite link has permissions for every command. If you wish, you can uncheck the permissions you don't want the bot to have.
infoMsg4: I'm coded by OGNovuh#0014 in the discord.js library.
I started as being coded for a single server.
I'm constantly updated, and the best place to find what changes I'm doing is on the GitHub repo.
